00278 /* Turn on specific features required by ME3000 */
00279 #if SPMIDI_ME3000
00280 
00281 /* ME3000 is a superset of ME2000 so we must also turn on ME2000 features. */
00282 #undef SPMIDI_ME2000
00283 #define SPMIDI_ME2000   (1)
00284 
00285 /* We require memory allocation for ME3000 */
